phrases: That is got nothing to do with Halloween.
Actually, we decided to hold a fair and make Western-style Japanese sweets.
Anyway, they are already made, and the fair is tomorrow, so I was thinking maybe you could come try some?
It is really something, so look forward to it!
I have been wondering for a while, but are you and Tamura-san going out?
That is how I see it.
In fact, I cannot see it any other way.
That is not how we are.
We are close of course, considering how long we have known each other.
But you are saying there are not any feelings beyond that between you two?
Let us say for example you had a very kind old Grandma.
Where is this totally unrelated example coming from?
One day, that Grandma gets magically transformed into a 15-year-old girl.
How would you feel about her, keeping in mind that she practically raised you?
I do not think I can imagine how I would feel in such a messed up situation.
We are pretty much like that.
Well, I do not really care if you understand or not.
Basically, you are not going out, and you never intend to?
Why are you asking me this?
So if some guy made a move on her, you would not care?
There is no way I would allow that!
I would beat the crap out of anyone messed up enough to do that.
She is nothing more than a childhood friend to you...
You are not going out with her...
You have no feelings for her...
But you would not allow any other guys to go out with her?
So what did you do last night?
I mean... something I found online that relieves stress.
If it works, let me know.
Are you going to get customers with this?
We are doing an event for the first day too.
We are going to invite the kids from around the neighborhood and show them how to make sweets and hand them out.
The workers are going to be dressed up as monsters too.
The rest of the family too.
No wait, he really is dead!
He got into the shop refrigerator a little while ago.
So this is what it was for...
But he does not have a pulse!
He is always had a weak pulse.
Why does he smell like a corpse?
That is his natural body odor.
Grandpa, if you do not cut it out, I will pull the hairs out of your head one by one.
Dang, you are one devil of a wife.
How could you even think of harming what little hair I have left?
Trick or... what was it again?
Has your brain started to rot?!
What is the number for an ambulance??
I am so glad you are still alive, Grandpa!
I got a little carried away...
I want to punch him in the face!!
I was just practicing my costume for tomorrow.
My zombie impression was great, right?
Actually, you seemed more like a normal corpse.
Any kid who sees you will get traumatized.
I do not think you should let them see that.
If you play along with him he will just go overboard again.
I will go get some of the Halloween candy then.
You seem to be popular with the grannies.
That does not make me happy!
And of course we have not!
That is a monk's buzzcut, you know...
then cut it with his clipper.
He even asked how short I wanted it.
That is a totally different hairstyle.
You are supposed to use a special razor for that.
Not that I know much about it...
Ever since you came back with that I have been wanting to say,
You should have just told him...
You cut your hair on a whim so you got what is coming to you!
When he got back from the barber he was all like,
From now on you can call me Rock!
P-Please go ahead and try some!
Well, you wanted to know what I thought...
I am so glad you like them!
Why do not you two just get married already?
Kyou-chan, let us go to my room.
Yeah, I guess this is not her we are talking about.
I think I have been staying up late studying too much these days.
I feel like just relaxing and taking a nap.
So that is what you meant...
I even left my textbooks at school.
I will go get some tea.
Do not you need to help prepare for the fair?
Yeah, but that will be after the shop closes.
The whole family will be working on it.
I will lend a hand then.
That would be a great help!
It is not exactly payment, but you can have dinner here then.
Look, a tea stalk is standing.
What the heck are you doing?
Rock is not how you look...
It is a way of life!
There is little difference between a skinhead and a short buzz!
Tomorrow, I shout with all my soul!
And why are you playing a shamisen?
That is more like a biwa player than a rocker.
We do not have a guitar
Um... do you want dinner first or a bath first?
It is been a while since you visited, so Grandpa and Grandma and Dad said you should stay over.
Grandpa and Grandma and Dad are really happy to see you again.
I get it, I will sleep over.
It is been so long since you slept over.
I used to come over all the time too.
It might be because, you know...
You are that age now, so you get nervous staying at a girl's house.
Why would I get nervous staying at your place?
It is more relaxing here than at home.
Nothing, I just thought it might be better that way.
He is staying at the Tamuras'.
Honestly, he is always acting like a little kid.
Did you talk to the parents?
They said it would help with their Halloween.
An-chan, how do you play a C minor?
There are not any chords on a shamisen, you know...
Kyou-chan, Dad's about to get out of the bath.
Do you want to take one next?
I am fine going after you.
Then how about taking one together?
You cannot take it back now, can you?
An-chan, you are a real man!
I will show you my hyper-weapon!
Kyou-chan wants to take a bath with me!
I put your futon in your usual room.
I guess I will sleep then.
I will go back to my room.
Teach me how to play this!
What do you want to play?
How many years has it been since we were up until bedtime together?
Just a little something with my heart...
What the heck are you doing, Grandpa?!
It is trauma from the War.
If you do not sleep there with Manami, my chest gets wracked with pain.
What kind of trauma causes that?!
Grandma's calling for me from across the River Styx...
We cannot sleep together at our age!
If you are okay with it.
It feels like we are kids again.
We used to sleep like this all the time back then.
I never thought we would do it at this age.
This is all that old codger's fault.
And Grandma... maybe some other time.
It would be nice if we went to the same college.
I wonder how things'll be if we graduate and go to the same college.
I do not think it will change much.
What if someone told you they liked you?
That kind of fantastic guy might never appear!
If... I do not know what if.
If someone told you they liked you, what would you do?
I like leading a peaceful life.
Things are fine the way they are right now.
Being able to relax in this kind of home is enough for me.
We have still got a long way to go.
Well, you are talking like a Grandpa.
Want to come to my place next time?
How many times is that now?
There is No Way My Childhood Friend Could Be This Cute
sonna yasashiku shinai de donna kao sureba ii no?
nakushita kagi ha mitsukaranai mama de
tameiki... surechigai ni iji hatte tsukarechau
hon no sukoshi chikaku kimi to no kyori ga
umaku tsukamenainda ato chotto na no ni
sugu ni ai ni ikitai kedo kotoba ha mitsukaranai shi
saigo no ichi pe-ji kurai kimi ni ha egao misetai
Do not be so nice to me, I just do not know how to react
With all these words piling up,
I cannot even see your face
I lost my key, now I cannot find it
Sigh, I will burn out if I keep acting like this whenever we fight
Just how far away I am, even though you are right there
Do not be so nice to me, see?
With all these lies piling up, I cannot even move
I want to see you now, but I do not know what to say
If this is the end for our story, I want you to see my smile
nagaku chikaku ni iru to mienakunaru mono
itsuka dokoka de mitsukete watashi ha kawatta
nee anata ha kawaranai ne dakara modokashii no
demo tabun sou iu toko fukumete suki nanda
zutto konna kankei ga tsudzukeba ii no ni
kyuu ni sunda kono maegami mitai ni
mezameta omoi ga mou modoranai kara
jimi na watashi dakedo sono mama de ii
anata no kotoba atsuku atsuku nokotteiru
When you have been together for so long, sometimes you just forget about it
Sometime, somewhere, I found it, but I had changed
Hey, you never seem to change, that is why I Am so upset
But I think that is part of what I like about you
Even though it would be so nice to stay like this forever
Just like my bangs that I suddenly cut short
My feelings all came up, now I cannot go back
I might be so plain, but that is all okay
Everything you said still warms me deep inside
There is No Way My Little Sister 0000 can be This Cute
There is No Way My Childhood Friend Can be this Cute
There is No Way My Little Sister Could Write a Novel
